Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2468 HISTORIC DECATUR ROAD,SUITE 200, SAN DIEGO, California, 92106, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nuvve Holding Corp is accelerating the electrification of transportation through its proprietary vehicle-to-grid (V2G) technology. It helps to support the integration of renewable energy sources, including solar and wind. Its Grid Integrated Vehicle (GIV) platform is refueling the next generation of electric vehicle fleets through bidirectional charging solutions.
